metadata.Title: CVE-2017-0670 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: A denial of service vulnerability in the Android framework. Product: Android. Versions: 5.0.2, 5.1.1, 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2. Android ID: A-36104177.

notes.Note: sbeattie> probably should be ignored, code does not look to present in these packages.

criterions.comment: android-framework-23 package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
android-platform-frameworks-base package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
